Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 2010...
Traded from Pittsburgh to New York (N) on 1/31/2012 (Going to NYN: SS A. Simmons. Going to PIT: P P. Clemens)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2012, off Matt Ginter (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/24/2012, off Daniel Hudson (ARI)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2012...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/11/2014...
Had 6 hits with 2 RBI against Houston on 8/21/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/2014, hitting .593 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Had 30-game hitting streak snapped on 5/30/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Florida on 4/12/2019...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Washington on 8/3/2019...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 2/4/2020 (Going to CIN: SS A. Simmons, 2B J. Giavotella. Going to NYN: 1B Z. Bonura Jr., SS F. Crosetti Jr.)...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2020...
Hit for the cycle against Atlanta on 6/15/2021...
Won World Championship with Cincinnati in 2021...
Drove in 6 runs against Los Angeles (N) on 9/5/2023...
